item.title: Daily Digest #01: Modeling life, underatanding power and Gautam Baid talk
item.description: Date: 2024-04-22 1.Modeling Life: Oscillation Link Bullet points: • Oscillatory behavior refers to a cyclical system behavior that occurs in the human body. • The hypothalamus (H), pituitary gland (P), and gonads (G) are involved in a hormonal feedback loop. • There is a negative feedback loop where increased gonadal hormones inhibit hypothalamus hormones. • This HPG axis can be modeled using differential equations with sigmoid functions. • Oscillations arise from time delays in the feedback loop and steep negative feedback curves.

item.title: Daily Digest #02: The minimalist entrepreneur Course, RBS and VIC
item.description: Date: 2024-04-23 1. The Minimalist Entrepreneur Course Link The Minimalist Entrepreneur Course, taught by Sahil Lavingia, aims to help aspiring entrepreneurs learn the principles of minimalist entrepreneurship. 2.Redfield, Blonsky & Starinsky Link Redfield, Blonsky & Starinsky, LLC is an investment management firm that specializes in value investing and portfolio construction. Their website offers a variety of useful links and notes. 3. Value Investors Club Link Value Investors Club (VIC) is an exclusive online investment club that aims to bring together top investors who share their best investment ideas.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I’m Alex Carter. I’m the curator of BestLists.top dedicated to collecting high-quality Twitter/X accounts, blogs, and websites. I write on Medium. If you come across any exceptional online resources, feel free to drop me a line via email at iamalexcarter@proton.me. Let’s connect and explore the digital landscape together!
